Description: The corpus contains speech recordings of ~32 German children learning Czech (type of study: interview).#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.
This corpus contains various speech tasks performed by French native speakers and the associated transcriptions.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from Ortolang.

This corpus contains speech recordings of Spanish children and teenagers learning English in Barcelona. across 4 tasks (written composition, oral narrative, oral interview and role play).#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains speech recordings of adult international students who spoke English as a second language and who had newly arrived at an Australian university. These undergraduate international students from various Asian backgrounds interacted over a period of seven months with Australian graduate students who were native speakers of English.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

The corpus contains speech recordings of 60 Japanese high school students learning English.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains speech recordings of 6 children learning English in Hong Kong.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

The corpus contains speech recordings of ~32 German children learning English (type of study: interview).#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.
This corpus contains film retellings performed by English and German native speakers.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the University of Oxford Text archive.

Corpus: A Learners' Corpus of Reading Texts
Description: This corpus contains unprepared readings by first-year students at an English department who speak French as a native language.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from Ortolang.

This corpus contains speech recordings of 3 students learning English as a second language.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains speech recordings of 95 students learning English in France (type of study: tasks/storytelling).#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains recorded interviews involving 19 Qatari learners of English.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains recordings of adult learners entering an Intensive English Program (IEP) in the United States during the year 2010. Tasks include 2 minute monologues.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

The corpus contains speech recordings of ~32 German children learning French (type of study: interview).#SEPThe corpus is a part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains various narrative and interactive speech tasks performed by English and Dutch native speakers.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the University of Oxford Text Archive. The transcripts and audio files can also be downloaded and browsed through through TalkBank.

This corpus contains speech recordings of 28 British undergraduates learning French before, during and after a year abroad. Tasks include oral interviews and and story retellings, aside from argumentative writing tasks.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus is a 3-year follow up to the LANGSNAP corpus, involving 18 participants.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains intermediate level spoken French from 17-18 year old second language learners, in years 12 to 13 of UK secondary education.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains speech recordings of 40 students learning French in France as a second language (type of study: tasks/storytelling).#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains recordings of 5 children (2 Irish, 1 Polish, 2 Cambodian) learning French in a school in France.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains oral proficiency interviews with 34 16-year-olds learning French in South Wales.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus consists of 25 recorded interviews with learners of French (9 adult learners) in Jamaica.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

The corpus contains speech recordings of 47 students learning German (type of study: interview).#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.
This corpus contains film retellings and the accompanying transcriptions.#SEPThe corpus is available for download  from the HZSK CLARIN-D repository.

The corpus contains recordings of 4 Carnegie Mellon University students learning German.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains recordings of 3 highschool students learning German abroad while living with German-speaking host families and attending German secondary schools in standard German-speaking urban and peri-urban regions of Germany.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

The corpus contains recordings obtained in a longitudinal case study of L2 Icelandic.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains speech recordings of 95 students learning Italian in France (type of study: tasks/storytelling).#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains speech recordings of ~120 college students learning Mandarin in Hong Kong (type of study: responses to questions).#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains speech recordings of 20 college students learning Mandarin in Hong Kong. The tasks involve oral interviews.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.
This corpus is a spoken corpus involving Chinese native speakers who learn Hungarian as a second language.#SEPThe subcorpora are available for download from and browsing through the TalkBank.

This corpus contains speech recordings of Berber students learning Spanish. The participants were 88 native speakers of Moroccan Arabic (Darija) and 26 speakers of Berber (Amazigh) living in Catalonia.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains speech recordings of Indoeuropean and Asian Learners, both semi-spontaneous and experimental, obtained in Barcelona, Spain (type of study: naturalistic, longitudinal).#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains speech recordings of 27 British undergraduates learning Spanish before, during and after a year abroad. Tasks include oral interviews and and story retellings, aside from argumentative writing tasks.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus is a 3-year follow-up to the LANGSNAP Corpus, involving 33 participants.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains speech recordings of 11 students learning Spanish as a second language.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains 10 recorded interviews involving students of Spanish as a Foreign Language have at the University of Alicante, in Alicante.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus consists of oral interviews carried out in the context of the LETRA test of Spanish for immigrant workers. It is made up of semi-guided interviews carried out in Spanish which last approximately 10 minutes each. The participants are immigrants from 11 different countries who live in the Autonomous Community of Madrid (Spain).#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains 67 videotaped presentations involving 95 North American students of Spanish as a Foreign Language at Nebrija University in Madrid.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains recordings of emails written and read by 28 Chinese students.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains recordings of 2 two children from Morocco learning Spanish in Spain learning Spanish.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.

This corpus contains recordings of L2 Spanish in a classroom context. There were 20 learners, all of whom were English native speakers, at each of 3 levels: beginners (Year 9 students aged 13-14), intermediate students (A2 students aged 17-18), and fourth year undergraduates.#SEPThe corpus is part of the SLABank collection, which is a component of TalkBank dedicated to providing corpora for the study of second language acquisition and learning.#SEPThe corpus is available for online browsing and download via TalkBank.
